body.name: Vaseline Intensive Care Spray Moisturizer For Dry Skin Cocoa Radiant Made With 100% Pure Cocoa Butter 6.5oz (Pack of 6)
features: 100 PERCENT RADIANT: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Spray On Lotion is formulated with 100 percent pure cocoa butter to hydrate dry skin by revealing its natural radiance
DEEP DOWN HYDRATION: Clinically proven lotion spray that moisturizes deeply, even within the first application, for glowing skin that looks and feels healthier
LOCK IN THE MOISTURE: Lotion is triple-purified microdroplets of Vaseline jelly create a protective barrier for skin care that locks in moisture for instantly softer skin
FULL & EVEN COVERAGE: A continuous non-aerosol spray dispenses non-greasy skincare moisturizer for dry skin that absorbs deeply without leaving a greasy residue

TRUSTED RELIEF: Daily spray moisturizer that helps heal dry skin by combining 100 percent pure shea and cocoa butter with Vaseline's trust formula that's been helping lock in moisture for over 150 years
THE HEALING PROJECT: Working with Direct Relief, we provide dermatological skin care, Vaseline Jelly and medical supplies to people affected by poverty or emergencies around the world
body.description: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Lotion Spray is the easy way to get even and full-body coverage that helps heal dry skin by delivering deep moisture. Vaseline is clinically proven to keep skin healed for 3 weeks (after using daily for 4 weeks), this non-greasy, fast-absorbing skin lotion is the perfect daily go-to moisturizer for dry skin. Our original healing microdroplets of Vaseline Jelly allow the skin’s natural barrier to recover by locking in that moisture. And when combined with 100 percent pure cocoa butter, an ingredient known to bring out the skins natural glow, it’s the ideal moisturizer for relieving everyday dryness while enjoying dewy glowing skin. Utilize Vaseline's Spray Lotion to enjoy instantly softer skin after showering, or whenever your skin feels dry. Vaseline Cocoa Radiant Spray On Lotion is the perfect daily body lotion for maintaining smooth, soft skin. The non-greasy formula relieves dry skin quickly by penetrating deep into skin’s layers, and it helps smooth rough skin, so skin feels soft and healthy. For best results when you have limited time, spray this body moisturizer over your body after you get out of the shower. Vaseline spray lotions are dermatologist-tested and approved and have been designed for easy application and even all-over coverage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Lotion Spray is the easy way to get even and full-body coverage that helps heal dry skin by delivering deep moisture. This non-greasy, fast-absorbing skin lotion is the perfect daily go-to moisturizer for dry skin.

HYDRATING INGREDIENTS This rich spray moisturizer is formulated with 100% pure cocoa butter to hydrate dry skin by revealing its natural radiance. MOISTURIZES DRY SKIN This lotion spray moisturizes and absorbs in seconds to help heal dry skin. SKIN CARE FOR EVERY NEED Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe and moisturize your skin. 150 YEARS OF VASELINE No matter what your skin needs, Vaseline has been there to help heal and protect it for the past 150 years.

Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Hand and Body Lotion, 10 oz Vaseline Petroleum Healing Jelly Original, 13 oz Vaseline Lip Therapy Lip Balm Tube Advanced Healing, 0.35 oz Main Benefit Made with cocoa butter and a blend of Vaseline Jelly, this body lotion helps keep your skin looking healthy and fresh. Vaseline Healing Jelly Original helps heal dry, damaged skin. This lip therapy protects and relieves dry chapped lips, while locking in moisture to help them heal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soothing and a Delicious Scent
reviews.reviewText: My legs started suffering more and more over the years along the shins to the point of daily discomfort. The itching drove me mad. Good news! I started using this product which saved sanity, my legs, and greatly improved quality of life. Maybe this sounds melodramatic and it is, but it’s worth sharing how much I like the convenience of spraying on the thin non greasy formula in these cans which have become a daily need. It goes on quickly, dries fast, and the scent is heavenly. You can smell cocoa butter but it’s not overwhelming. My legs smell good enough to eat... which is why I’ve begun carrying around a swatter to avoid being mistaken for a bar of delicious chocolate.The cans are so lightweight they seem as if they are made of all plastic which is great if you need to take them with you for vacation and the sprayer has a lock position to prevent accidental pressing. Give this stuff a try and you might love it as much as I do. I also use Vaseline Total Moisture Cocoa Radiant Body Gel Oil for my arms where it’s easier to apply but it’s a heavier feeling product than the spray. It feels good on and works well too. Both are long lasting on. If I could change anything it would be their pricing as it’s a little bit high for what it is. Buying in bulk provides little relief in that regard but I hate to run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sprays nice to end of can. No waste. Nice smell. Not greasy. Packs well for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS STUFF!
reviews.reviewText: works great when getting out of the shower. Just spray and rub in, not greasy at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and convenient.
reviews.reviewText: Great at keeping skin from being dry and itchy without greasiness. Not too thick or greasy. Great coverage when spraying after drying off. Great quality. Very convenient and quick to spray on post shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Try to spray all of the cans right away
reviews.reviewText: This stuff smells so good!! It is very light weight on the skin. In fact, I kind of wanted it to be a little more greasy/glossy but it wasn’t. My skin does feel moisturized though. My only issue is that one of the cans doesn’t spray. It was the first one I tried and promptly tried the rest of them.It doesn’t make sense to return all 6 because one can doesn’t work, and I’m going to guess that there will be one in the replacement set that won’t work too. It’s disappointing.As for the product review, I like it! It’s not what I expected but I still like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is wonderful. Absorbs and softens very well, and easy to apply!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizer ever!
reviews.reviewText: I HATE the way lotion feels on my skin and the time it takes to dry, so this is my perfect solution! Leaves my skin feeling smooth and luxurious without having to go through the normal hassle. Huge quality of life increase!

reviews.reviewTitle: It is a great product for moisturizing you back if you have no one to do it for you.

reviews.reviewText: Everything about this lotion is great: the smell, how quickly it absorbs, how my skin feels afterward, and the ease of use.
Great after a shower, leaves skin soft and the fragrance is subtle

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it and can't believe they stopped carrying in stores
